get.description: This API lists a particular number of users in a group, based on the limit defined.
This API fetches the details of a particular user group.

delete.description: This API deletes a user group from your help center.

patch.description: This API helps update the details of a user group.

post.description: This API removes particular users from a group.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of groups, based on the limit defined.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of groups to list. The default value and the maximum value allowed is 50.

schema.description: Number of groups to list. The default value and the maximum value allowed is 50.

parameters.name: searchBy
parameters.description: Search keyword to use for finding a particular group The keyword must contain at least two characters.        Three types of search are supported: @keyword*@ (search for values that start with the keyword, @*keyword*@ (search for values that contain the keyword),          and @keyword@ (search for values that are exact matches of the keyword).

schema.description: Search keyword to use for finding a particular group The keyword must contain at least two characters.        Three types of search are supported: @keyword*@ (search for values that start with the keyword, @*keyword*@ (search for values that contain the keyword),          and @keyword@ (search for values that are exact matches of the keyword).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Index number, starting from which the groups must be fetched. The default value is 1.

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the groups must be fetched. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the list of groups by a particular attribute: -(@createdTime@, @modifiedTime@, @name@, or @count@)

schema.description: Key that sorts the list of groups by a particular attribute: -(@createdTime@, @modifiedTime@, @name@, or @count@)

parameters.name: helpCenterId
parameters.description: ID of the help center from which the resource must be fetched

schema.description: ID of the help center from which the resource must be fetched

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Activation status of the group. Values supported are @ACTIVE@ and @DISABLED@

schema.description: Activation status of the group. Values supported are @ACTIVE@ and @DISABLED@

post.description: This API creates a user group in your help center.
This API adds users to a particular group.
